text: Roger Allan Francis Soloman (May 16, 1939 â€“ April 14, 2021) was a Canadian provincial politician and educator on Prince Edward Island. He served as member of the Legislative Assembly of Prince Edward Island (MLA) from 1993 to 1996, sitting with the Prince Edward Island Liberal Party. He died April 14, 2021 at the Queen Elizabeth Hospital in Charlottetown a month before his 82nd birthday. title: Roger Soloman
